description: Continuous rotation, 3 years grazed ley-arable treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
Continuous rotation, 3 years cut grass/clover ley-arable treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
Continuous rotation, 3 years arable treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops. See crop_types_data for details of arable crops
Continuous rotation, 3 years arable treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops. See crop_types_data for details of arable crops
Continuous rotation, 3 years lucerne ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
(Replaced Lu) Continuous rotation, 3 years grass/clover ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
(Replaced Cg) Continuous rotation, 3 years grass ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
(Replaced Ln) Continuous rotation, 3 years grass/clover ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
(Replaced L) Continuous rotation, 3 years grass/clover ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
(Replaced Lc) Continuous rotation, 3 years grass/clover ley treatment crops followed by 3 years arable test crops
Grass reseeded at start of experiment. Grazed by sheep.  Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (Rc) vs grass with nitrogen (Rn) 1963-1990, then continued as Rc.
Sub-plots of R. Grass reseeded at start of experiment, grass with nitrogen, cut for silage. Same cropping as c sub-plot
Sub-plots of R. Grass reseeded at start of experiment, grass/clover without nitrogen, cut for silage. Same cropping as n sub-plot
(Replaced Rn and Rc sub-plots, 1963-1990) Grass seeded at start of experiment, grass/clover cut for silage.
Grass seeded at start of experiment, ploughed up and converted to the arable with hay treatment 1963-1972 and then returned to permanent grass in 1973.

Grass seeded at start of experiment, ploughed up and converted to the arable with hay treatment 1963-1972 and then returned to permanent grass in 1973. Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (c) vs grass with nitrogen (n) 1973-1990. This sub-plot grass with nitrogen. Cut for silage. Same croppping as c sub-plot

Grass seeded at start of experiment, ploughed up and converted to the arable with hay treatment 1963-1972 and then returned to permanent grass in 1973. Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (c) vs grass with nitrogen (n) 1973-1990. This sub-plot grass/clover without nitrogen. Cut for silage. Same cropping as n sub-plot

(Replaced Rpn and Rpc sub-plots, 1962-1990). Grass seeded at start of experiment, ploughed up and converted to the arable with hay treatment 1963-1972 and then returned to permanent grass in 1973, grass/clover without nitrogen. Cut for silage.
Land kept in bare fallow
Permanent grass from before start of experiment. Grazed by sheep. Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (Gc) and grass with nitrogen (Gn) 1962-1990, then continued as Gc.

Pernament grass from before start of experiment. Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (c) vs grass with nitrogen (n) 1962-1990. This sub-plot grass with nitrogen. Cut for silage. Same croppping as c sub-plot

Pernament grass from before start of experiment. Divided into sub-plots, testing grass/clover (c) vs grass with nitrogen (n) 1962-1990. This sub-plot grass/clover without nitrogen. Cut for silage. Same croppping as n sub-plot
(Replaced Gc and Gn sub-plots, 1962-1990). Permanent grass from before start of experiment, grass/clover without nitrogen. Cut for silage
Permanent grass from before start of experiment, accidentally ploughed up in 1964 and sown to wheat before being returned to permanent grass in 1965. Not divided for Gn vs Gc treatments 1962-1990.

(Replaced [G]) Permenent grass from before start of experiment accidentally ploughed up in 1964 and sown to wheat before being returned to permanent grass in 1965. Grass/clover without nitrogen, cut for silage.

Plots converted to Highfield Reversion Experiment (R/CS/679) then Highfield Conversion Experiment (R/CS/767) and are no longer part of the Highfield Ley-Arable Experiment - see https://www.era.rothamsted.ac.uk/experiment/rcs767
